title: Happy Valenkink's Day
description: (Suncoast Society #44, BDSM, various, HEA)The Suncoast Society is having a BDSM Valentine’s Day party, and “Aunt” Tilly’s watching the kids while everyone else attends the “adult” festivities. She’s planned arts, crafts…and combat practice.What could possibly go wrong?Let’s just say it’s a good thing some of the Doms have well-stocked first-aid kits in their toybags.
author: Tymber Dalton
